name: Red Stare (Café Ducha Siesta)
description:
Solve puzzles with your laser-shooting eyes as you find your way to the top of the office, to get your hands on the laser-stopping goggles.

If you want to play the original GMTK Game Jam 2020 version, you can do so with this link: https://cafe-ducha-siesta.itch.io/red-stare-jam

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cafeduchasiesta/

And on youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyXe8gXwKIGBwFx614XNVtA
